inn1.comm: on a length, defended on the back foot. Ball rising slowly off the wicket.
a little fuller, played back down the wicket firmly
on a length, on middle, defended stoutly
quicker, Irfan defends on the half and half
length ball, on off, Irfan tries one over the top, doesn't get hold of it but enough on it to clear mid-off
faster, fuller, let through outside off
full, defended
full, skewed drive, in the air to extra cover, Hashmatullah fields well
full, on-driven
climbs off a length,but slowly, Irfan leaves the off-cutter alone
down leg, Irfan misses with the attempted flick
length ball, on middle, defended stoutly
wide of off, let go
full and pushed firmly to mid-off, applause from the Hong Kong fans for Irfan's probity
nothing more than a glance, but beats point and third man
top shot, leans into an off-drive and Shkwat on his comeback is looking good
full, on middle and leg and the well-timed drive torments mid-on all the way to the boundary
good comeback from Dawlat, beats the batsman outside off
down leg
full, beats the forward push, Shafiqullah drops it low down in front of him. Was that an edge?
over the top he goes! Irfan is such a sweet hitter! Lands just over the long-off rope
tip and run to the off-side, good running
the off-cutter, batsman cautious
causing problems is Mirwais, rolling his fingers over the ball every delivery, landing on a length
full, pusged back past the bowler, and another quick single is taken
on a length, beats the outside edge, batsman's feet together, big appeal for a catch behind but he's not out
full, on the legs and Shkwat thumps it into the leg-side gap to the square leg scoreboard. Good shot
pitched up and driven sweetly straight, Shkawat looking very good
beaten this time by a ball just seaming away outside off
short, pulled to fine leg
full, pushed to the off-side, no chance of a single
trademark off-cutter from Mirwais, on a length and jagging away, Irfan draws his bat inside the line
straight through to the keeper, Shkawat not risking anything
beaten by the off-cutter, Mirwais doing well
ball popping, off a length, Mirwais a real handful on this deck
on a length, defended
shot! Checked drive to a full-length delivery on middle, straight past the bowler's right hand
climbs off a length, 'keeper Shafiqullah takes chest-high
defended on the back foot
back of a length, seaming away, left alone
full, in the slot, and lofted straight back over the bowler
full, big appeal for lbw
on a length and seaming in for variation
off-cutter, worked away off a length to backward square
attempted leg-cutter that doesn't do much after pitching on leg, helped round backward of square
pitched up, Irfan doesn't time the cover drive
on one knee to drive, no timing to cover
full, on leg, lofted through square leg
full, defended, Irfan almost run-out at the bowler's end by the wicket-keeper seeing he'd come down so far
full, fast, jagging in, big appeal for lbw, hint of inside edge though, end of a good over. Afghanistan's first maiden of the innings
on a length, defended to point, Shkawat sent back, Sami just misses with the throw
good catch by deep cover, running back to mid-off, drive taking the outside half of the bat  mis-timed, end of a good knock
full, driven to mid-on
back of a length, the leg-cutter beats the outside edge
back of a length on off, punch-drive to cover
dropped a little short but at Usman's pace the ball doesn't get up, Hong Kong's captain content to defend to the off-side
full, and on off, played to backward point
full, on off, played square
full, driven back firmly, Mirwais fields in his follow-through
jams the bat down in time, Mirwais picking up the pace here
shoots through outside off, left alone
full, outside off and that's Mirwais's second consecutive maiden
that delivery swung and seamed, Atkinson still finds the middle of the bat, albeit with no timing
defended stoutly
fullish length on middle and leg and swung casually over midwicket, such a sweet strike
on a length on middle, defended
leg-side, yorker-length, appeal for lbw
outside off, left alone
fuller, defended
full, in the slot, driven straight to mid-off however
down leg
varying his pace here, Mirwais, Atkinson waits for that on the back foot before punching to the off
driven, mistimed, just short of mid-off.
another quick single
quikcer delivery, back of a length on off, punched square
leg-cutter, beats the prod outside off
slightly slower delivery, on leg, driven crisply to deep mid-on
full, on off-stump, driven to cover, no chance of a run
short, glanced away fine past slip
length delviery, grips a bit, beaten outside off
floats up and then spins away sharply outside off
on his legs and meat and drink to Shkawat
full, driven to deep extra cover
tossed up, defended
misses with the big slog sweep, ends up doing the splits on the way to being stumped
big appeal for lbw, end of a fine over
full length ball, swatted like a sultan, powered to long on
nudged away round the corner, scurry through
flighted, drops on off, driven sweetly to long-off
good stroke, the glance to fine leg goes all the way
tossed up again, slower delivery, played to cover
flick-driven to long-off, stroke of a batsman in form
full, driven firmly to long-off
on a length, defended
swept backward of sqaure
faster and flatter, misses with the sweep this time
on a length, on middle, played back
swept again, squarer this time
tossed up on leg, driven to deep mid on
length ball, forward to defend
beaten outside off
down on one knee to sweep again
full and driven back hard over the bowler's head
forward, searching for that delivery a little, soft hands keeps the ball down and away from slip
slower, lots of flight, driven to long-on
appeal for lbw by the bowler and no one else
paddled round but fine leg inside the circle fields
tossed up, driven crisply and Rahmat Shah does very well at the long on boundary, diving to save runs
spinning away outside off, left alone
that sweep's been productive for Jamie Atkinson today
and yet it's led to his downfall too, misses one that's full and slides under the bat
faster, Nizakat defends on the back foot
swept hard, fetched from middle, fine leg inside the circle fields well
driven towards long on
forward to drive, no real power, Nabi picks up
fired in flat, goes for a mighty heave, miscued to midwicket
forward to defend no chance of a run
tries a dink from well in front of him, fine leg inside the circle picks up
worked away backward of square
swept very fine, with power
big appeal for lbw for the doosra
full, defended by the batsman
faster and flatter, Nizakat goes deep in the crease and works it away to mid-on
tossed right up and slammed sweetly to the long-on boundary
beaten trying to cut
tucked away fine, opportunistic single against a slightly lackadaisical fielder
turned off his legs, another good single
shot! Hit as hard as any thing will be this tournament, mid-on didn't have far to go but the ball flashes past the dive
full toss swung off the sweet spot over backward square leg's head
Nizakat Khan keeping short fine leg busy but not being able to beat him with those dinks and paddles
top shot, driven to square leg
through to 'keeper Shafiqullah
back of a length, chopped out to point on the bounce
looking for that yorker, driven out to extra cover on one knee
on a length outside off, unmolested
forward on a length, push-driven to extra cover, Noor Ali fires in a throw, Babar has to hurry at the bowler's end
full, and driven to Noor Ali at extra cover
driven to long on
swept hard, in the air for a while and beats square leg's big dive
forward to defend, no chance of a run
back of a length, played off the back foot to point, Babar hustles through
steady bowling from Shahpour, that off-stump line and length maintained
a little fuller, played to backward point
shot, Sir! Babar steps forward to drive a full-length delivery and the ball simply races off the bat to long-off
Nizakat's been trying to score with that paddle dink all day, and it remains his least productive stroke. Misses that time and only one decision's possible when the deliveries are that straight
off the mark straight away with a firm drive to long on
slight mishit of the drive to midwicket, evades the circle fielder though
full, driven to long on
full, on off, stroked away to extra cover
firm in defence to another off-stump delivery
another good ball, no room allowed for any aggressive stroke
another top shot from the quiet man, forward to hit on the up through long-off
the doosra! Appeal for lbw
tapped over the infield
driven to long on
the doosra delivers this time. Feathers the outside edge
another big appeal as the ball thuds into the pads
full, defended
full, looking for the top half of off-stump, defended
off-cutter, jags in late, inner half of the bat to mid on, quick single
hitting the deck with plenty of arm is Mirwais, skidding the ball through, Sharma hurried into defence
pushed away to the off-side
swept fine, doesn't beat the circle fielder
defended back to the bowler
drops short, pulled in front of square
outfield's very quick at Bayuemas, grass cropped like velvet
forced into defence by another Mirwais delivery that skids through off a length
on a length and check-driven to long off
and is welcomed by a stroke that sends the flighted delivery into the trees at midwicket
back of a length, climbs up and is forced away onside
good tip and run from Hong Kong, inching towards 250 as Babar adds to his reputation with his first ODI 50
length ball chopped away to third man
flighted, turns and bites outside off
another one that grips and turns, bat tucked inside the line though
flat-batted while leaning forward, mid-off gets a hand on it
misses with the attempted cut
pitched up, driven to long-off
flicked away to backward square, one-handed pick-up, swivel and throw by Dawlat just misses with the throw
length ball, defended on the back foot
short, goes to pull, high on the bat and goes high and straight to long on. Fine hand by Babar and for him as he reaches the pavilion
yorker length delivery, worked away
down the wicket, sliced to backward point
shimmies down again but mistimes it high, bowler and Nabi set themselves beneath it, Hamza pouches
down on one knee to swat away to midwicket
short and high over the batsman's attempted cut
fuller, and driven to mid-off
climbs off a length, beats the flashing drive attempt
flat bats a drive and then sets off a little gingerly and can't beat the direct hit from mid-off Hamza
misses with the heave, stumps knocked down by Shafiqullah but the back leg was planted
reverse sweep to backward point
another lumberjack-shot attempted but no timber connected
outside off
full: two stumps set flying, one of them ten feet away from the crease once it stops moving.
shoots past the outside edge
full and fast and too much for any tailender

inn2.comm: Shot! Pitched up, comes forward to drive and by the time mid-off had turned the ball was just yards from the long-off boundary
defended
beaten outside off, length ball
defended on the back foot
back of a length, on off, defended on the back foot
turned off his hips for an easy one
length ball on off, defended
bit more on that delivery, finds the outside edge, the bottom hand taken off the bat, ball angles down past second slip, not a chance, to third man
length delivery, angling in, cramps Noor Ali for room, taken on the thigh, two moral victories in a row for Haseeb
whatever the physio did for Noor Ali, it worked, square drives the next ball immaculately to the boundary
fine cover drive to a ball of full length
forward to drive Tanwir's quickest delivery so far, takes on mid-off's arm, direct hit would have been close
back of a length, climbs over the attempted cut
had to hurry the defensive stroke
just a slight stutter in the delivery stride, ball lands gently in the slot before being slammed back over the bowler's shoulder for a skimming maximum
defended on the front foot
forward to defend, turns his wrists on the length delivery but no power in the stroke
outside off

Homer Simpson cricket by Noor Ali here! Pushes a drive back down the track, Usman had been backing up, gets back in time to beat the throw, Noor Ali had kept on ambling down the crease, the throw comes back towards him and knocks down his stumps and he's wondering on the long walk back, as we are, how on earth he could get out like that
slightly uppish cut, lands in front of backward point
close fielders go up for the play and miss
Leans into a sumptuous cover drive, classy stroke to a decent delivery
fuller, on leg, clipped to mid on
slow looper from Nadeem, down on one knee to cut gently to backward point
bit more on that attempted cut but straight to cover
driven to long-off
on a length on middle, defended
a little short, swivelled round to square leg
driven, lands just short of backward point
short, climbs up steeply, defended, quick single, throw from Nizakat means the batsman has to dive headlong into the crease at the bowler's end
cut with authority. Some stroke
Irfan really making the ball climb off a freshening deck, finding bounce that had evaded even Shapoor earlier in the day. Rahmat Shah on his toes to defend
a little short, outside off, late cut down to third man
Flashed at hard and flies past vacant second slip down to third man. Irfan has his hands on knees
tucked off his legs
on a length, defended, Rahmat Shah looks like he has a lot of time to play a bowler even of Irfan's pace
played to cover for an easy single
driven to cover
late cut, third man does well to save runs on the boundary
CHANCE short, sits up, hit to the right of mid-off who drops the knee-high offering
forward to drive, ball races to the cover boundary
CATCH! Flick down leg, ball travelling fast and Jamie Atkinson makes a difficult chance look so easy moving one-handed to his left
beats the attempted cut
forced into a defensive stroke, still one slip in place
a defensive push, squirts past point's right hand
firm defensive push to mid-off
bouncer and hooked away high over fine leg, big stroke from the young man
CHANCE Another hook, another boundary but this one went straight through the hands of Shkawat at square leg before trickling over the rope
scurried single
tossed up, driven to long off
chopped away to short third man and that's a fine 50 for the young man on his national team debut
turned off his legs to midwicket, Shakawat puts in the hard yards and saves from square leg
swept along the ground to backward square
turns and bounces but Usman rides them both and glances down to fine leg, beating the man inside the circle
more on that one from Nadeem fizzes it through, Usman defends
cheeky single to short fine leg
short and wide outside off, slashed on the bounce to backward point
forward to defend a quicker one
full on off, and bottom hand-driven to mid-off
full toss, driven to long off
tossed up, slammed back. Midwicket runs back to collect from beyond the boundary. Usman playing with immense confidence
beaten in the flight a little is the batsman, Nadeem is a class bowler
tossed up, in the slot, sent soaring towards the big black sightscreen
looking to drive a full delivery, not to the pitch
comes down the track, ball takes the outside edge and flies to short third man. The young man's set a mark in his first ODI
worked off his legs to square leg
on a length defended
DROPPED rising ball, attempted square cut , spilled at slip. Third miss of the day by Hong Kong and that's not like them at all
full, defended, Hashmatullah always seems to play the appropriate stroke to every delivery
wide outside off, takes a lot of the outside edge, flies wide of slip and races to the third man boundary
full, driven to point, Hashmatullah just makes it back to beat the direct hit
flashes hard, flies wide of slip down to third man
back of a length, another fast delivery, glanced down to backward point
full, on the pads, played to square leg
worked off his pads to backward square and there isn't a fielder in the world whose throw Sami thinks he can't beat
late cut to short third man
back of a length and Sami goes back in his crease to punch to mid-off
back of a length from Irfan again, Sami rides the bounce and plays it square
Sami the improviser, flicks a bouncer over fine leg,
and with all the unorthodoxies he can play a cover drove of immaculate timing and placement
takes a single when maybe one there shouldn't have been possible
short down leg and helped round, fine leg neglects to put in a dive
beaten outside off, bat tucked in as the ball goes past
forward to defend, ball scoots past the outside edge, appeal from the bowler
on a length, on off, defended
full, on the pads, played in front of square
tossed up, driven firmly but straight to mid off
really rolling his fingers over the ball Nadeem, Sami plays with the spin to backward point
just short enough to allow the batsman to rock back and swivel-drive to long on
tucked away for an easy single
DROPPED hardest of the chances but the cut shot went straight into both hands of the point fielder
who is beaten to his left this time by the cut stroke. Doesn't at all feel like its going to be Hong Kong's day
on a length, on middle, defended
chipped to midwicket
flies quickly by outside off
bouncer, attempted hook, goes over the top of the bat
short, pulled to square leg
short again, pulled away hard, beats Nadeem at square leg and that's the 50-partnership too
full, played to point
short and swung round fine
full and slammed back, over the rope in front of the sightscreen
square driven
finally some reward for Irfan, Sami flashes hard and is caught at backward point.
beats the outside edge
driven to mid on
tossed up, driven hard, back to the bowler
short and pulled away in front of square
on a length, on middle and off, defended

An anticlimactic end to a game that was in Afghanistan's control from the three-quarter point of the Hong Kong innings, 216 was unlikely to be enough on a slow but true batting surface. Afghanistan's bowlers all did well, Mirwais the pick with 0-25 off his 10 overs, Hamza and Nabi taking 5-55 off their combined 20. Afghanistan's debutant and Man of the Match Usman Ghani played some audacious strokes on his way to 70 off 68 and with Hong Kong dropping five catches, Afghanistan raced away with the game.
